model.orders.fct_orders.name: fct_orders
model.orders.fct_orders.description: Fact table for orders, includes revenue and transaction details.

order_id.description: Primary key for the orders table.

total_amount.description: The total revenue from an order.

order_date.description: The date the order was placed.

customer_id.description: Reference to the customer who placed the order.

signup_date.description: The date when the customer registered.

model.products.dim_products.name: dim_products
model.products.dim_products.description: Dimension table listing product details and categories.

model.sales.fct_sales.name: fct_sales
model.sales.fct_sales.description: Fact table capturing sales transactions and performance metrics.

sale_id.description: Unique identifier for the sale transaction.

order_id.description: Reference to the order associated with the sale.

model.marketing.dim_campaigns.name: dim_campaigns
model.marketing.dim_campaigns.description: Dimension table for marketing campaigns and channels.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for each marketing campaign.

channel.description: Marketing channel used for the campaign.
